text: Sheffield United F.C. is an English football club who play in Sheffield, Yorkshire, England. They play their home games at a stadium called Bramall Lane == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 First Division 10th 2001/02 First Division 13th 2002/03 First Division 3rd 2003/04 First Division 8th 2004/05 League Championship 8th 2005/06 League Championship 2nd 2006/07 Premier League 18th 2007/08 League Championship 9th 2008/09 League Championship 3rd === Former position === == References == Category:Football clubs in Sheffield Category:1889 establishments in England
title: Sheffield United F.C.
